PGS Catalog Releases

Source: vignettes/getting-releases.Rmd
getting-releases.Rmd

The function get_releases() gets you information about PGS Catalog releases; namely, the number of newly released polygenic scores, publications and performance metrics, as well as their respective associated identifiers (i.e., new pgs_ids, pgp_ids and ppm_ids).

Latest release of the PGS Catalog

To get information about the latest release, run get_releases() with default argument values:

get_releases() # Or get_releases(date = 'latest')
#> An object of class "releases"
#> Slot "releases":
#> # A tibble: 1 × 5
#>   date       n_pgs n_ppm n_pgp notes                                            
#>   <date>     <int> <int> <int> <chr>                                            
#> 1 2025-03-17    27    95     8 This release contains 27 new Score(s), 8 new Pub…
#> 
#> Slot "pgs_ids":
#> # A tibble: 27 × 2
#>   date       pgs_id   
#>   <date>     <chr>    
#> 1 2025-03-17 PGS005141
#> 2 2025-03-17 PGS005142
#> 3 2025-03-17 PGS005143
#> 4 2025-03-17 PGS005144
#> # ℹ 23 more rows
#> 
#> Slot "ppm_ids":
#> # A tibble: 95 × 2
#>   date       ppm_id   
#>   <date>     <chr>    
#> 1 2025-03-17 PPM022361
#> 2 2025-03-17 PPM022362
#> 3 2025-03-17 PPM022363
#> 4 2025-03-17 PPM022364
#> # ℹ 91 more rows
#> 
#> Slot "pgp_ids":
#> # A tibble: 8 × 2
#>   date       pgp_id   
#>   <date>     <chr>    
#> 1 2025-03-17 PGP000704
#> 2 2025-03-17 PGP000711
#> 3 2025-03-17 PGP000712
#> 4 2025-03-17 PGP000713
#> # ℹ 4 more rows

Release by date

You can use the argument date to select a specific date (if a release exists for this day) in the format "YYYY-MM-DD", e.g., "2020-11-20":

get_releases(date = '2020-11-20')
#> An object of class "releases"
#> Slot "releases":
#> # A tibble: 1 × 5
#>   date       n_pgs n_ppm n_pgp notes                                            
#>   <date>     <int> <int> <int> <chr>                                            
#> 1 2020-11-20     4    50     5 This release contains 4 new Score(s), 5 new Publ…
#> 
#> Slot "pgs_ids":
#> # A tibble: 4 × 2
#>   date       pgs_id   
#>   <date>     <chr>    
#> 1 2020-11-20 PGS000340
#> 2 2020-11-20 PGS000341
#> 3 2020-11-20 PGS000342
#> 4 2020-11-20 PGS000343
#> 
#> Slot "ppm_ids":
#> # A tibble: 50 × 2
#>   date       ppm_id   
#>   <date>     <chr>    
#> 1 2020-11-20 PPM000923
#> 2 2020-11-20 PPM000924
#> 3 2020-11-20 PPM000925
#> 4 2020-11-20 PPM000926
#> # ℹ 46 more rows
#> 
#> Slot "pgp_ids":
#> # A tibble: 5 × 2
#>   date       pgp_id   
#>   <date>     <chr>    
#> 1 2020-11-20 PGP000107
#> 2 2020-11-20 PGP000108
#> 3 2020-11-20 PGP000109
#> 4 2020-11-20 PGP000110
#> # ℹ 1 more row

All releases 

(all_releases <- get_releases(date = 'all'))
#> An object of class "releases"
#> Slot "releases":
#> # A tibble: 95 × 5
#>   date       n_pgs n_ppm n_pgp notes                                            
#>   <date>     <int> <int> <int> <chr>                                            
#> 1 2025-03-17    27    95     8 This release contains 27 new Score(s), 8 new Pub…
#> 2 2025-02-26     8    49     8 This release contains 8 new Score(s), 8 new Publ…
#> 3 2025-02-04    31    60     3 This release contains 31 new Score(s), 3 new Pub…
#> 4 2024-12-16    11    21     7 This release contains 11 new Score(s), 7 new Pub…
#> # ℹ 91 more rows
#> 
#> Slot "pgs_ids":
#> # A tibble: 5,088 × 2
#>   date       pgs_id   
#>   <date>     <chr>    
#> 1 2025-03-17 PGS005141
#> 2 2025-03-17 PGS005142
#> 3 2025-03-17 PGS005143
#> 4 2025-03-17 PGS005144
#> # ℹ 5,084 more rows
#> 
#> Slot "ppm_ids":

#>   date       ppm_id   
#>   <date>     <chr>

#> 2 2025-03-17 PPM022362
#> 3 2025-03-17 PPM022363
#> 4 2025-03-17 PPM022364
#> # ℹ 19,813 more rows
#>
